TextView.android:text: Cloud Computing is the latest technology that will make life easier for people in organizations dealing with huge amounts of data and information. Today institutions, both government and private, invest a great deal in maintaining servers to store that information. However, not all of this data is accessed frequently. This result is under utilization of available services and unnecessary costs. That's where cloud computing helps.
